languages.text: "Потому что мы — дети, родившиеся в пустоте меж звезд, будь то утроба странствующего корабля, орбитальный спутник или забытая на астероиде станция. Низкая гравитация, прыжки сквозь варп и бесконечные опасности космических путешествий — все то, что другие так боятся и ненавидят, для нас — привычное дело".

traits.locale_text: "Потому что мы — дети, родившиеся в пустоте меж звезд. Будь то утроба странствующего корабля, орбитальный спутник или забытая на астероиде станция. Низкая гравитация, прыжки сквозь варп и бесконечные опасности космических путешествий — все то, что другие так боятся и ненавидят, для нас — привычное дело".

languages.text: "Because we are the children born in the void between the stars, be it the womb of a travelling vessel, an orbital satellite, or a forgotten asteroid station. Low gravity, voyages through the warp, and the countless dangers of space travel — everything others hate and dread is second nature to us."
languages.original_text: "Потому что мы — дети, родившиеся в пустоте меж звезд, будь то утроба странствующего корабля, орбитальный спутник или забытая на астероиде станция. Низкая гравитация, прыжки сквозь варп и бесконечные опасности космических путешествий — все то, что другие так боятся и ненавидят, для нас — привычное дело".

traits.locale_text: "Because we are the children born in the void between the stars, be it the womb of a travelling vessel, an orbital satellite or a forgotten asteroid station. Low gravity, voyages through the Warp and countless dangers of space travel, everything the others hate and dread, are second nature to us."

"Because we are the children born in the void between the stars, be it the womb of a traveling vessel, an orbital satellite, or a forgotten asteroid station. Low gravity, voyages through the warp, and the countless dangers of space travel — everything others hate and dread is second nature to us."

"Because we are the children born in the void between the stars, be it the womb of a traveling vessel, an orbital satellite, or a forgotten asteroid station. Low gravity, voyages through the warp, and the countless dangers of space travel — everything others hate and dread is second nature to us."

"Because we are the children born in the void between the stars, be it the womb of a travelling vessel, an orbital satellite, or a forgotten asteroid station. Low gravity, voyages through the warp, and the countless dangers of space travel — everything others hate and dread is second nature to us."

languages.text: «Nos llaman así porque somos los niños nacidos en el vacío entre las estrellas, ya sea en el seno de una nave en tránsito, un satélite orbital o una estación olvidada en un asteroide. La baja gravedad, los viajes por la disformidad y los incontables peligros del viaje espacial... todo eso que los demás temen y odian nos resulta innato».
languages.original_text: "Because we are the children born in the void between the stars, be it the womb of a travelling vessel, an orbital satellite, or a forgotten asteroid station. Low gravity, voyages through the warp, and the countless dangers of space travel — everything others hate and dread is second nature to us."

traits.locale_text: «Nos llaman así porque somos los niños nacidos en el vacío entre las estrellas, ya sea en el seno de una nave en tránsito, un satélite orbital o una estación olvidada en un asteroide. La baja gravedad, los viajes por la disformidad y los incontables peligros del viaje espacial... todo eso que los demás temen y odian nos resulta innato».

languages.text: “因为我们是在群星之间的虚空中诞生的孩子。漫游的飞船、轨道卫星，或是被遗忘的小行星站，都可能是我们的故乡。其他人惧怕、讨厌的一切，包括低重力、亚空间旅行，以及太空旅行的无数危险，我们早都习以为常了。”
languages.original_text: "Because we are the children born in the void between the stars, be it the womb of a travelling vessel, an orbital satellite, or a forgotten asteroid station. Low gravity, voyages through the warp, and the countless dangers of space travel — everything others hate and dread is second nature to us."

traits.locale_text: “因为我们是在群星之间的虚空中诞生的孩子。漫游的飞船、轨道卫星，或是被遗忘的小行星站，都可能是我们的故乡。其他人惧怕、讨厌的一切，包括低重力、亚空间旅行，以及太空旅行的无数危险，我们早都习以为常了。”

languages.text: 「だって私達は、移動する船の子宮であっても、軌道衛星であっても、忘れられた小惑星ステーションであっても、星の間の虚空で生まれた子供達なのですから。無重力、歪みを股にかけた船旅、そして宇宙移動中に起きる無数の危険…他の者達が憎み恐れるものは、すべて生まれつきあるものです」
languages.original_text: "Because we are the children born in the void between the stars, be it the womb of a travelling vessel, an orbital satellite, or a forgotten asteroid station. Low gravity, voyages through the warp, and the countless dangers of space travel — everything others hate and dread is second nature to us."

traits.locale_text: 「だって私達は、移動する船の子宮であっても、軌道衛星であっても、忘れられた小惑星ステーションであっても、星の間の虚空で生まれた子供達なのですから。無重力、歪みを股にかけた船旅、そして宇宙移動中に起きる無数の危険…他の者達が憎み恐れるものは、すべて生まれつきあるものです」

languages.text: "Er rührt daher, dass wir Kinder der Leere zwischen den Sternen sind, ob unser Mutterleib nun ein reisendes Schiff, ein Satellit im Orbit oder eine vergessene Station auf einem Asteroiden ist. Geringe Schwerkraft, Reisen durch den Warp und die zahllosen Gefahren der Raumfahrt – was andere hassen und fürchten, ist für uns eine zweite Natur."
languages.original_text: "Because we are the children born in the void between the stars, be it the womb of a travelling vessel, an orbital satellite, or a forgotten asteroid station. Low gravity, voyages through the warp, and the countless dangers of space travel — everything others hate and dread is second nature to us."

traits.locale_text: "Er rührt daher, dass wir Kinder der Leere zwischen den Sternen sind, ob unser Mutterleib nun ein reisendes Schiff, ein Satellit im Orbit oder eine vergessene Station auf einem Asteroiden ist. Geringe Schwerkraft, Reisen durch den Warp und die zahllosen Gefahren der Raumfahrt – was andere hassen und fürchten, ist für uns eine zweite Natur."

languages.text: « Parce que nous ne sommes pas nés sur une planète, mais dans le vide entre les étoiles, que ce soit à bord d'un vaisseau, sur un satellite orbital ou dans une station oubliée sur un astéroïde. La gravité réduite, les traversées du Warp et les innombrables dangers des voyages spatiaux... Tout ce que d'autres détestent et redoutent est une seconde nature pour nous. »
languages.original_text: "Because we are the children born in the void between the stars, be it the womb of a travelling vessel, an orbital satellite, or a forgotten asteroid station. Low gravity, voyages through the warp, and the countless dangers of space travel — everything others hate and dread is second nature to us."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que nous ne sommes pas nés sur une planète, mais dans le vide entre les étoiles, que ce soit à bord d'un vaisseau, sur un satellite orbital ou dans une station oubliée sur un astéroïde. La gravité réduite, les traversées du Warp et les innombrables dangers des voyages spatiaux... Tout ce que d'autres détestent et redoutent est une seconde nature pour nous. »

languages.text: "Çünkü ister yolculuk eden bir geminin rahminde, ister bir yörünge uydusunda, isterse de unutulmuş bir asteroit istasyonunda olsun bizler, yıldızlar arasındaki uçsuz bucaksız uzayda doğmuş çocuklarız. Düşük yer çekimi, öteboyut seyahatleri ve uzay yolculuğunun sayısız tehlikesi gibi diğerlerinin nefret edip korktuğu şeyler, bizim günlük hayatımızın bir parçasıdır."
languages.original_text: "Because we are the children born in the void between the stars, be it the womb of a travelling vessel, an orbital satellite, or a forgotten asteroid station. Low gravity, voyages through the warp, and the countless dangers of space travel — everything others hate and dread is second nature to us."

traits.locale_text: "Çünkü ister yolculuk eden bir geminin rahminde, ister bir yörünge uydusunda, isterse de unutulmuş bir asteroit istasyonunda olsun; bizler yıldızlar arasındaki uçsuz bucaksız uzayda doğmuş çocuklarız. Düşük yerçekimi, öteboyut seyahatleri ve uzay yolculuğunun sayısız tehlikesi gibi diğerlerinin nefret ettiği ve korktuğu şeyler, bizim günlük hayatımızın bir parçasıdır."
